ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. Our guild wizzy do the pulling, I am not sure how they do it. All I know they cast the eye at zone in, and next moment BAM! Phinigel at zone ! =) 2. Not
ygData.messageBody:
1. Our guild wizzy do the pulling, I am not sure how they do it. All I know they
cast the eye at zone in, and next moment BAM! Phinigel at zone ! =)

2. Not sure, best bet is to get a Sorcerer to do it. There has been train to
zone in with Phinigel before, I think it's pulled by a lower level wizard.

3. Don't really get what u mean here.

4. If I am not wrong, SG is not up until all SS is killed. Only Phinigel see
invis when it's full pop.

5. Right at zone in, u should be able to see the msg.

6. Should be okie, but not tested.

Damuo, a monk without a god.
Divine Grace
Erollisi Marr








"K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...> on 27/04/2001 01:53:11 PM

Please respond to sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com



To: "'sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com'"
<sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>

cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)



Subject RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
:







1. If using eye method, where shld I cast eye? I mean against which wall?

2. If PA kill my eye and come for me, will it train along the way (prolly
won't, so fr nvr heard this, but better double check, hehe) to zone in?

3. No aggro = no summon right?

4. Only PA and guardian see my invis eye? How abt SS etc?

5. How deep from zone in do I have to swim in b4 I can hear PA casting? Or
I can hear it casting JUST zone in? How long do I normally have to wait to
see it cast (5 min or 10min)?

6. Wonder if it works with 2 tanks (warr and rog/mnk), 1 enc (c2, arg), 1
shm (speed, slow, dot), clr (heal/rez) and wiz (to loot, hehe).

Thx.



On 27 April, 2001 11:55 AM, kctan@...
[SMTP:kctan@...] wrote:
>
>
> I would bring 3 Melees, 1 Shaman, 1 Wizzy and 1 Cleric. Might want to
bring an
> enchanter for C2.
>
> You will see PA casting when she's up at zone in.
>
> Lvl 60 puller invis up, go to centre of spire and drop down, Once u see
PA
> casting, swim up and ask ur mage to CoTH. Then run back to see whether PA
is
> alone out of her lair. If so, just pull her back. But I prefer to use
just the
> eye to pull to zone in. Much easier and faster. Any danger just zone out.
>
>
> Damuo, a monk without a god.
> Divine Grace
> Erollisi Marr

>
> Btw, sure can hear PA casting xxxx at zone in? If yes then I just park

>

PA
> out?

> > Just to make some noise here: Need tips to kill PA in Kedge Keep with 1
> > team:
> >
> > 1. What is the best combo of this team, average lvl?
> > 2. Is the eye pulling method a bannable offence (ie use eye spell to
pull
> > PA to zone in).
> > 3. Alternatively is to invis all the way to ledge, how siong is it to
> kill
> > the 4 SS, guardians and PA?
> > 4. Anything to watch out when fighting PA and its kakis?
> > 5. I thinking of parking a druid at KK zone in, with max 125 tracking
> > skill, I wonder if he can track PA from zone in or have to swim deeper
to
> > track? Is it true that all mobs in KK cannot see invis except
guardians
> > and PA? Is there any safe room near PA where I can invis a druid and
> park
> > there to check if PA is up? If k, then it's better to track 1st then
> call
> > grp than the other way round.
> >
